result.reason: extApps.xml is a non-secret external app template store by design, and sensitive values should be supplied at runtime via replacement tokens rather than persisted there.
result.approach: Close as by-design and clarify in documentation/comments that credentials must be passed through secure runtime placeholders (e.g., %PASSWORD%) instead of hardcoded arguments.
